sentences.en: A common type of inner ear deafness seen in adults is that due to acoustic trauma.
sentences.cn: 在成人所见到的常见的内耳性聋是由于听力受到损伤的缘故.

sentences.en: Acoustic emission is the characteristic and irreversible sound emitted by a material when it is deformed.
sentences.cn: 声发射是当材料变形时所发出的特殊的不可逆的声响.

sentences.en: Echo Sounder is a kind of acoustic measuring depth equipment, which can measure depth with the time between transmitted wave and echo on condition in which the speed of ultrasonic is fixed.
sentences.cn: 回声测深仪是用来测量水深的一种声学测量设备，其以水中超声波的传播速度为确定条件，利用发射波与反射回波时间差来测量水深。

sentences.en: Electromagnetic acoustic transducer ( EMAT ) is a new ultrasonic transmitting and receiving device.
sentences.cn: 电磁 超声换能器 是一种新型的超声波发射接收装置.

sentences.en: Even at this distance, the stresses are too great for well - behaved acoustic transmission.
sentences.cn: 即使在这段距离上,对于良好的声学传播来说, 应力也显得太大了.

sentences.en: He plays a solo acoustic set.
sentences.cn: 他伴着原声乐器独唱了一组歌曲。

sentences.en: Hot firings show that the frequency of the oscillating shock is close to the acoustic frequency.
sentences.cn: 热试结果表明,振荡激波的频率与声频相近.

sentences.en: In our case, we have found the true acoustic echo beacon.
sentences.cn: 但在这种情况下，我们发现了真正的声学‘回声灯塔’ ”。

sentences.en: In this performance, Rattle had the acoustic of the Symphony Hall on his side.
sentences.cn: 这场演出中，拉特尔有交响乐大厅出色的音响效果做他的后盾。

sentences.en: In this performance, Rattle had the acoustics of the Symphony Hall on his side.
sentences.cn: 在这场演出中，拉特尔有着交响音乐厅传声效果的翼助。

sentences.en: It was in this context, led with the Plantronics acoustic songs Seoul cooperation.
sentences.cn: 就是在这样的背景下，促成了缤特力与歌尔声学的合作。

sentences.en: Many acoustic drivers are substantially symmetric about the axis of motion 22.
sentences.cn: 很多声学驱动器围绕运动轴线22基本对称.

sentences.en: Rock music usually has a strong back beat and often revolves around guitar either electric or acoustic.
sentences.cn: 摇滚音乐通常有一个强大的背拍，并经常围绕吉他，无论是电或声学。

sentences.en: She was backed by acoustic guitar, bass and congas.
sentences.cn: 原声吉他、贝斯和康茄鼓为她伴奏。

sentences.en: The acoustic emission also shows a decreasing rate , following the drop in stress - intensity factor.
sentences.cn: 随着应力强度因子的下降, 声发射也随着减少.

sentences.en: The disturbance is sound wave, conforming to the laws of acoustic propagation in solids.
sentences.cn: 这种扰动是种声波, 它遵从在固体中声波的传播规律.

sentences.en: The hall has a fine acoustic.
sentences.cn: 这个大厅的传音效果很好.

sentences.en: This firmly establishes the nature of the oscillations as low acoustic eigenmodes of the subphotospheric layers.
sentences.cn: 这就确凿地证实了振荡的本质是次光球层的低频声波本征模式.

sentences.en: This gives it excellent thermal and acoustic properties, but the suitability of the product for a large-scale commercial project was questioned.
sentences.cn: 这给了它出色的热学和声学属性，但是这种产品是否适合于一个大尺度的商业项目还是个问题。

sentences.en: Unlike optical systems, acoustic check systems can bother the passengers of a vehicle a lot.
sentences.cn: 不像光学系统, 声学检验系统会使车上的乘客感到相当厌烦.

sentences.en: You must have an acoustic problem.
sentences.cn: 你的听觉一定有问题。

trans.tran_cn: 听觉的，声学的，原声的，音响的
trans.tran_en: relating to sound and the way people hear things

trans.tran_cn: 原声乐器；不用电传音的乐器
trans.tran_en: If you refer to the acoustics of a space, you are referring to the structural features which determine how well you can hear music or speech in it
